doc.after: Traditional medicine also known as indigenous or folk medicine comprises knowledge systems that developed over generations within various societies before the era of modern medicine The World Health Organization WHO defines traditional medicine as the sum total of the knowledge skills and practices based on the theories beliefs and experiences indigenous to different cultures whether explicable or not used in the maintenance of health as well as in the prevention diagnosis improvement or treatment of physical and mental illness 1
